# CSM

 ![CSM sticker](man/figures

<!-- badges: start -->

<!-- badges: end -->

CSM is a R developed toolbox to analyze spatially resolved tissue data. To see a demo of CSM capabilities please see related [publication](publicationURL).

## Installation

You can install the development version of CSM from [GitHub](https://github.com/) with:

``` r
devtools::install_github("Alvaro-LJ/CSM")
```
